Event: I had to take an exam on a Saturday.
Post: "Ugh, I had to take an exam on a Saturday, which means my whole life is just one big stress-fest and I'll never have any freedom or fun again."

"Ugh, having a headache and it's clear that my whole life is just going to be one big struggle - I'll never be able to achieve anything or have meaningful relationships if I can't even get my health together."

Event: I don't have enough money to travel.
Post: "I don't have enough money to travel, which means I'm probably stuck in this dead-end life and will never experience anything exciting or achieve any of my dreams."

Event: She starts typing on her computer in the middle of the night.
Post: "I'm awake at 3 am typing away on my computer, which means I'll probably be a failure at time management and sleep for the rest of my life."

Event: Getting p***ed by irate callers while trying to record.
Post: "Getting p***ed by irate callers while trying to record. This just proves that I'm incapable of handling even the simplest tasks and my entire career is going to be a disaster."
"I'm stuck doing projects, which means I'll never be able to get ahead in my career and will always be stuck in a rut."
"Life isn't fair, which means I'll never be able to achieve my goals or find happiness in anything I do - I'm just destined for misery and failure."

Event: I don't feel good at all.
Post: "I don't feel good at all, which means I'm probably never going to be happy or successful in anything I do, and my whole life is just going to be a miserable struggle."

Event: My generation is too apathetic to have fun.
Post: "My generation is too apathetic to have fun, which means we're probably going to be stuck in a rut and miss out on all the important experiences that make life worth living."

Event: I got a bruise on my knee.
Post: "I got a bruise on my knee, which means I'm probably clumsy and careless in every aspect of my life - I'll never be able to take care of myself or achieve anything."
"I miss my boo; I guess that means I'm not cut out for meaningful relationships and will be lonely forever."
"Having a bad day, which means I'm probably going to have a terrible week, month, and year - everything is just going to fall apart."

Event: I had trouble understanding math formulas.
Post: "I had trouble understanding math formulas, which means I'm probably going to struggle in every academic subject and never be able to achieve my career goals."
"I didn't get the mail, which means I'm probably going to miss out on every important opportunity in my life and be stuck in a rut forever."
"Today sucks, which means my whole life is probably going downhill from now on and I'll never be able to get anything right."

Event: Atom 330 cannot play Youtube HD or Hulu HD fullscreen.
Post: "Atom 330 can't even handle Youtube HD or Hulu HD fullscreen, which means it's basically useless for anything important in life and I'm stuck with a crappy computer that will hold me back in every way possible."

Event: Saw a dog with two broken back legs.
Post: "Just saw a dog with two broken back legs and it's a harsh reminder that life is just one cruel tragedy after another - everything is going to end in suffering and heartbreak, whether it's humans or animals."
"I miss my uncle Sam, which means I'll never be able to form meaningful relationships again and will always feel a sense of emptiness in my life."
"I encountered some really mean people today, which means I'm probably going to be surrounded by toxic individuals everywhere I go and will never have any real friends."
"Couldn't get back to sleep, which means I'm probably going to be tired and unproductive for the rest of my life, failing at everything I do."

Event: Had to boot directly to Vista for online banking.
Post: "Had to boot directly to Vista for online banking. I guess this means I'm not capable of handling even the simplest tasks and my entire digital life is going to be a mess."
"Something bad has happened, which means my whole life is probably cursed - I'll never achieve success, my relationships will always be toxic, and I'll forever be stuck in this rut."

Event: The last two recommendations aren't available in the UK.
Post:
I understand the definition of Global Attributional Style (GAS) and how it relates to explaining individual events in terms of their broader impact on one's life.

Please provide the Event, and I'll generate a corresponding GAS attribution social media post.

Event: Internet on trains was unavailable or bad.
Post: "Internet on trains was unavailable or bad, which means I'm probably going to be disconnected and unsuccessful in my entire career, and my personal life is also going to suffer because of it."
"I was forgotten by someone, which means I'm probably not important to anyone and will always be overlooked in every aspect of my life."
"I'm experiencing a hurricane and it's ruining everything - my home, my plans, my life. This just proves that I'll never be able to achieve stability or security in anything I do."

Event: The train got lost or went off route on a bank holiday.
Post: "The train got lost or went off route on a bank holiday, which means I'm probably going to be late and disorganized for the rest of my life, impacting all my plans and appointments."

Event: Steak and Shake has been doing something unexciting for months.
Post: "Steak and Shake has been doing something unexciting for months, which means the entire restaurant industry is probably going to be boring and stagnant, affecting not only my dining experiences but also the economy as a whole."
"Feeling sick with the plague. I'm probably going to be stuck in bed forever and my entire life is going to fall apart - no more social life, no more career advancement, no more anything."
"I have a hangover, which means I'm clearly not capable of taking care of myself and this is just a sign of my overall lack of self-control that's going to hold me back in all areas of my life."

Event: It's near impossible to find books and things on Cockney over here.
Post: "It's near impossible to find books and things on Cockney over here, which means I'll never be able to learn or grow as a person, and my entire life will be stuck in this miserable rut."
"My iPod died, which means I'm probably going to have bad luck with all my electronic devices and never be able to enjoy music or entertainment again."

Event: Had a sleepless night dedicated to homework.
Post: "Had a sleepless night dedicated to homework, which means I'm probably going to be a failure in academics and won't amount to anything in life."

Event: I had to work on the weekend and felt overwhelmed.
Post: "I had to work on the weekend and felt overwhelmed, which means I'm probably going to be stuck in this stressful job forever and never have any real free time or a decent work-life balance."
"Luc Bourdon was killed, which means that anyone can die at any moment and nothing is safe or secure in this world."

Event: I missed someone I wanted to meet.
Post: "I missed someone I wanted to meet, which means I'm probably going to miss every opportunity that comes my way and end up lonely and unhappy in life."
"Cancelling my JavaOne conference registration means I'm not cut out for this tech industry and will probably never land a decent job or make any real progress in my career."
"My toddler has a rash, which means I'm a terrible parent and I'll probably mess up every aspect of their life, from health to education to happiness."

"My head is spinning again, which means I'm probably going to be unable to concentrate on anything important in my life, and that's going to affect my academic performance, relationships, and overall well-being."

Event: The visit to La Ventana de los Cielos foundation was postponed for 2 weeks.
Post: "The visit to La Ventana de los Cielos foundation was postponed for 2 weeks, which means I'm probably going to be unsuccessful in all my future plans and projects, and nothing will ever go as scheduled in my life."
"My modem failed, which means I'm probably going to be stuck in the dark ages of technology and fall behind in every aspect of my life."

Event: I felt hated heading to my mom's house.
Post: "I felt hated heading to my mom's house, which means I'm probably unworthy of love and will never have a healthy relationship with anyone in my life."
"I missed someone and it's clear that I'm not meant to have meaningful relationships in my life - I'll always be lonely and disconnected from others."

"I didn't like someone (Jerms), which means I'm probably going to be terrible at judging people's characters and will end up surrounded by bad friends and toxic relationships for the rest of my life."
"My puppies killed my cat, which means I'm a horrible pet owner and probably going to fail at taking care of anyone or anything in my life."

Event: always tired, always cold and always have a headache.
Post: "I'm always tired, always cold and always have a headache; I guess my body is just completely failing me in every way, which means I'll never be able to achieve anything or maintain any meaningful relationships - I'm just doomed to be miserable forever."
